interpretation:
The "family: man, boy, boy" card represents the importance of familial bonds and relationships. It highlights the joy and comfort that come from spending time with loved ones, whether it's a father and his sons, siblings, or any other close family members. This card may also indicate a desire to reconnect with family members or to create a stronger sense of community within one's own family. 

When this card appears in a reading, it encourages the seeker to cherish their family connections and to prioritize spending time with loved ones. It may also suggest the need to work on healing any past wounds or conflicts within the family. Overall, the "family: man, boy, boy" card reminds us of the importance of family as a source of comfort, support, and belonging.
